Metronotes Governance

Production

The finite creation of 1,000,000,000,000 XMN is the clear production goal. Additional derivative units may be produced within the platform. The developers have sole discretion in exercise of Burn Cycles.

View Details »

Authority

Metronotes is guided and influenced by its core developers and stakeholders. We strongly believe in the principle of transparency and provide everything about the suite and its data publically. Everyone is allowed insight in manner that is safe for the market participants.

View Details »

Guidance

From time to time, we may elect as well implement forecasts, rules, sanctions, and various other concepts as they may arise. If permitted, public disclosure of such events may be presented by the executives at the time.

View Details »

Freemarket Distribution

Distribution is set to occur through traditional offerings. All market participants have an equal oppurtinity in an environment that provides clear freedom from certain risks. Private trades and offerings may exist and go beyond the scope of the project.

View Details »
